channel.title: GitHub on Musings of an Itinerant Software Designer
channel.description: Recent content in GitHub on Musings of an Itinerant Software Designer

item.title: Making this site work
item.description: One of the more fun things about setting up this site (or at least fun for me!) is getting to have vim open again, and being able to see how my words will properly be marked up and translated. I guess it makes me remember what it is to be someone who does this day in and out (organising teams of engineers is fun, but I do miss building code sometimes).
